item.title: About
item.description: I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science from Purdue University. I was affiliated with the Center for Education and Research in Information Assurance and Security (CERIAS). I’m currently interested in designing reliable and massively scalable distributed systems. In my current project, I’m working on a real-time, scalable, and resilient stream processing ecosystem. Previously, I’ve worked on distributed software-defined storage and multiple areas of information security.
